  • Method Details

    • create

      public T create(ObjectLoader loader, Object element, org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers)
      Description copied from class: Attribute
      This implementation casts config to the target type. It can be used where not special conversion is required, e.g. config is a String and feature type is String.
      Specified by:
      create in interface ObjectFactory<T>
      Overrides:
      create in class Attribute<T>
      base - Base URL for resolving references.
      Returns:
      Created object
